text: Stephen William Marsh (12 September 1924 â€“ 5 March 2024) was an Australian rules footballer. He played for South Fremantle and East Fremantle in the West Australian National Football League (WANFL). His playing career lasted from 1945 to 1960. He is viewed as one of the best rovers of his era. Marsh was born in Kalgoorlie, Western Australia. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Sportspeople from Western Australia
title: Steve Marsh (footballer)
